projects.name: Send Jimmy To Europe
projects.description: You can be a part of sending Jimmy to Europe.
projects.usage: Money will be used for plane tickets, accomodations, meals, and tours.
projects.rewards: Jimmy will send you a postcard and bring you back a t-shirt.

projects.name: Pay for my treatment
projects.description: Can you please help pay for my cancer treatment?
projects.usage: Money will be used for chemo-therapy, radiation and surgery.
projects.rewards: Jamie will keep you updated on her progress

projects.name: GuitarAxe (The guitar that doubles as an actual axe!)
projects.description: Help us take the GuitarAxe from dream to reality!
projects.usage: Money will be used for product development, testing and prototyping.
projects.rewards: Donations over $5,000 - GuitarAxe prototype, other donations - GuitarAxe sticker and literature.
